participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys an active lifestyle and socializing.
participant_1.background: I go to the gym regularly. I have short hair. Two dogs live with me. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and optimistic, values friendships and staying active.
participant_2.background: I just want to have fun with my friends. I work took i have a part time job at burger king. I am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. They are constantly on my back. I do not drink or do drugs or anything.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Not much, just working on a paper for school.
Oh, what's the paper about?
It's about the history of the hamburger.
That sounds interesting. Do you like hamburgers?
Yeah, I love them! They're my favorite food.
Me too! I love making them at home.
Really? I've never tried making them at home.
It's really easy! You just need some ground beef, buns, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onions.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'll love it.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to the gym, hang out with my friends, and play video games.
I like to do those things too! What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but my favorite is probably Call of Duty.
I've never played Call of Duty, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome! So, what do you think about working at Burger King?
It's not bad, but it's not the best job in the world.
I know what you mean. I used to work at a restaurant, and it was a lot of work.
Yeah, it can be pretty tough. But it's a good job to have while you're in school.
Yeah, that's why I'm doing it. I'm saving up money for college.
That's smart! I'm going to college too.
Oh, cool! What are you going to study?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about business.
That's a good choice! Business is a great field to go into.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
